projects.title: E-Commerce Microservices Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce platform built with microservices architecture, handling user management, product catalog, order processing, and payment integration.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A full-stack chat application with real-time messaging, file sharing, and user presence indicators using WebSocket technology.

projects.title: Task Management API
projects.description: RESTful API for task management with user authentication, role-based access control, and real-time notifications.

projects.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard for business intelligence with data visualization, filtering, and export capabilities.
